com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.manager

Class ManagerManager<T1 extends Manager,T2 extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.manager.ManagerManager<T1,T2>
  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - The class that extends Manager
    T2 - The class that extends Event
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreManagerManager

    public abstract class ManagerManager<T1 extends Manager,T2 extends Event>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the managers. It loads them, then registers them for Events.
    Author:
    Quint

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EventBusService<T2> busService
      A reference to the EventServiceBus that controls all the T2 Events
      private java.util.ServiceLoader<T1> classLoader
      Loads all the T1 Managers
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,T1> classMap
      A map that relates the simple name of each manager to the Manager instance
      private java.lang.Class<T1> toLoad
      The top level Class T1 that extends Event

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManagerManager(EventBusService<T2> busService, java.lang.Class<T1> toLoad)
      Creates a new ManagerManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkMethodsAndSubscribe(java.lang.Object object, T2 event)
      Private method to check if methods in an Object are annotated for the Event>, and if they are, subscribe them
      T1 getManager(java.lang.String simplifiedName)
      Returns the Manager based on the simple class name passed
      void initialize()
      This method loads and instantates each class, adds them to the classMap, then registers them for T2 Events.

      This method registers any submanagers for Events.

        A reference to the EventServiceBus that controls all the T2 Events

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManagerManager

        public ManagerManager(EventBusService<T2> busService,
              java.lang.Class<T1> toLoad)
        Creates a new ManagerManager
        Parameters:
        busService - The EventBusService associated with the Manager
        toLoad - The top level Class T1 to load with the ServiceLoader. Generics cannot be used here to to generic's limitations.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method loads and instantates each class, adds them to the classMap, then registers them for T2 Events. This is called during FlamingOctoIronman.init().

      • postInitialize

        public void postInitialize()
        This method registers any submanagers for Events.

      • checkMethodsAndSubscribe

        private void checkMethodsAndSubscribe(java.lang.Object object,
                            T2 event)
        Private method to check if methods in an Object are annotated for the Event>, and if they are, subscribe them
        Parameters:
        object - The Object that contains the methods to be checked
        event - The Event the check the methods against

      • getManager

        public T1 getManager(java.lang.String simplifiedName)
        Returns the Manager based on the simple class name passed
        Parameters:
        simplifiedName - The simple name of a Manager's class
        Returns:
        A Manager with the simple name simplifiedName
